definitions: Exercise ultimate power or authority over (an area, group, or people).
Control and direct the public affairs of a country, group of people, or organization.
Be the most important or influential factor.
Make a decision or pronouncement, especially as an official body or judge.
Mark (something) with lines, typically with a ruler.
examples: The king rules his kingdom wisely.
The judge will rule on the admissibility of the evidence.
She ruled the page for her drawing.
